project_descr: Through the new PIP, UNDP will provide further technical assistance to the implementation of the SDGs in Indonesia (TA-SII) that will focus on three areas.

outputs.output_descr: Policies and institutions for the governance and implementation of SDGs at national level are designed.
Policies and institutions for the governance and implementation of SDGs at provincial level are designed.
Management and Technical Assistance for Government and CSOs in Supporting the Implementation of Global Fund for AIDS, Tuberculosis, and Malaria in Indonesia as Contribution to SDG 3.
Strengthen cold chain management through improved human resources capacity, institutional strengthening and supporting supervision.

document_name: Technical Assistance to SDGs Implementation in Indonesia
